---

## Section Reference
Which section of SPEC.md has the error?

## The Bug
Describe the error (typo, incorrect formula, broken example, etc.)

## Expected Behavior
What should it say/do?

## Actual Behavior
What does it currently say/do?

## Evidence
(If applicable) Why is this an error? Reference other sections, examples, or implementations.
